articles.content: OnePlus is expected to launch its new OnePlus 9 series sometime this month. The company is rumored to launch as many as four new products, including the OnePlus 9, the OnePlus 9 Pro, the OnePlus 9R, … [+2032 chars]

articles.title: Google Preps For Remote Work Future With 'Workspace' Refresh - NDTV
articles.description: Google is updating its productivity software to better meet the needs of frontline and remote workers, in a bet that the pandemic has permanently changed how work gets done.
articles.content:
While Workspace has 2.6 billion users, the suite is free for individuals.
